```{r data-get-car-with-best-mpg}
best_car <- data_cil %>% 
  slice_max(mpg, n = 1) %>% 
  select(car, mpg, disp)

best_cars_table <- data_cil %>% 
  slice_max(mpg, n = 5) %>% 
  select(car, mpg, disp)
```

```{r data-analysis-plot}
car_plot <- data %>% 
  ggplot(
    aes(
      x = mpg,
      y = wt
    )
  )+
  geom_point(aes(color = factor(cyl)))+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE, color = "black", linetype = "dashed")+
  theme_classic()+
  labs(
    x = "Miles Per Gallon",
    y = "Weight in Tons",
    color = "Number of Cylinders"
  )
```
